Description.Text: Hotel Residence La Quintinie Square is a comfortable 3-star property offering bright accommodation near the heart of Paris. Highlights include free Wi-Fi and a good location near Volontaires metro station. Vaugirard is a lively former village built along a Roman road that was annexed to Paris in 1860. Nearby places of interest include the landmark skyscraper Tour Montparnasse, the Champ de Mars park and the magnificent Eiffel Tower. Volontaires metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Paris destinations. The hotel is housed in a 20th-century mid-rise building. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Champagne Studios are decorated in a detailed style with light wood furniture, wood floors and patterned stone walls. They feature a kitchenette and a view of the inner courtyard. Amenities include air-conditioning, satellite TV, a fridge and work desk. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. Every studio contains all the equipment needed to cook individual meals, and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.
